title: Long-Anticipated Stephen King Movie May Go Straight To Streaming
description:
One would suspect that an adaptation of an iconic Stephen King story would be an immediate box office success. Warner Bros seems to be second-guessing this, however, as their plans for Salem’s Lot may have just changed. It looks like the film could very well be released via streaming rather than theatrically.
